Events

search

Trigger this event to manually perform a search action on the menu.
Obviously, this only has any effect if there is a search field prepended to the menu.


Code example:

$("#my-menu").mmenu();
$("#my-menu").trigger( "search.mm", "query" );
  • Events for the menu:
  • open
  • close
  • toggle
  • Other events:
  • setPage
  • setSelected
  • Events for submenus
    • open
    • close
    • toggle
  • Events for the searchfield
    • search
    • reset
